verses.verse: When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, there was <S%H7578>trembling<s%>; he <S%H5375>exalted<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but when he <S%H816>offended<s%> in <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, he <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And now they <S%H2398>sin<s%> more and <S%H3254>more<s%>, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> them molten <S%H4541>images<s%> of their <S%H3701>silver<s%>, even <S%H6091>idols<s%> according to their own <S%H8394>understanding<s%>, all of them the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%>: they <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H120>them<s%>, Let the men that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5401>kiss<s%> the <S%H5695>calves<s%>.

Therefore they shall be as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that passeth <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H1980>away<s%>, as the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that is driven with the <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> out of the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, and as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of the <S%H699>chimney<s%>.

Yet I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> no <S%H430>god<s%> but <S%H2108>me<s%>, and besides <S%H1115>me<s%> there is no <S%H3467>saviour<s%>.
I did <S%H3045>know<s%> thee in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of great <S%H8514>drought<s%>.

According to their <S%H4830>pasture<s%>, so were they <S%H7646>filled<s%>; they were <S%H7646>filled<s%>, and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7311>exalted<s%>: therefore have they forgotten <S%H7911>me<s%>.
Therefore am I unto them as a <S%H7826>lion<s%>; as a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> will I <S%H7789>watch<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>;

I will <S%H6298>meet<s%> them as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> that is <S%H7909>bereaved<s%> of her <S%H7167>whelps<s%>, and will rend the <S%H5458>caul<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and there will I <S%H398>devour<s%> them like a <S%H3833>lioness<s%>; the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> shall tear <S%H1234>them<s%>.
It is thy <S%H7843>destruction<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that thou art against <S%H5828>me<s%>, against thy help.

Where <S%H645><s%> now is thy <S%H4428>king<s%>, that he <S%H165>may<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> thee in all thy <S%H5892>cities<s%>? and thy <S%H8199>judges<s%>, of whom thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%>?
I have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee a <S%H4428>king<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and have <S%H3947>taken<s%> him away in my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.
The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is bound <S%H6887>up<s%>; his <S%H2403>sin<s%> is laid up in <S%H6887>store<s%>.

The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of a travailing <S%H3205>woman<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H2450>him<s%>: he is an unwise <S%H1121>son<s%>; for it is time he should not <S%H6256>tarry<s%> in the <S%H5975>place<s%> of the breaking <S%H4866>forth<s%> of <S%H1121>children<s%>.

I will <S%H6299>ransom<s%> them from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>; I <S%H165>will<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> them from <S%H4194>death<s%>: O <S%H4194>death<s%>, where are thy <S%H1698>plagues<s%>? O <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, where <S%H165>is<s%> thy <S%H6987>destruction<s%>? <S%H5164>repentance<s%> shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%> from mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Though he be <S%H6500>fruitful<s%> among his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, an east <S%H6921>wind<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> coming <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and his <S%H4726>spring<s%> shall become <S%H954>dry<s%>, and his <S%H4599>fountain<s%> shall be dried <S%H2717>up<s%>: he shall make <S%H8154>spoil<s%> of the <S%H214>treasure<s%> of all <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%>.

Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall bear her <S%H816>guilt<s%>; for she hath <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against her <S%H430>God<s%>: they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; their <S%H5768>infants<s%> shall be dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%>, and their women with <S%H2030>child<s%> shall be ripped <S%H1234>up<s%>.
